name: hlmul0
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4), wcel(c0, cnv))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈ c2, (0[c3]c1)= c4, c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(0[c3]c1)= c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(0[c3]c1)= c4)

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cns, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cn0v, c0))

⊣ c3 =(.sOLD ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(0vec ` c0)
